functionalJobs.jobStatement: When I want to find events to attend, I want to easily access the calendar of events, so I can quickly see what fits my schedule.
functionalJobs.currentSolution: The newcomers website calendar and event listings.
functionalJobs.painPoints: The website resets to an earlier date when returning from an event, requiring scrolling to find the desired date.
functionalJobs.desiredOutcomes: A seamless navigation experience that allows returning to the last viewed date in the calendar.
functionalJobs.successCriteria: I can return to the exact date I was viewing without needing to scroll through weeks or months.

emotionalJobs.jobStatement: When I visit the newcomers website, I want to feel welcomed and comfortable, so I can enjoy my experience and engage more with the community.
emotionalJobs.currentSolution: The current website layout and design.
emotionalJobs.painPoints: The website is not visually appealing or inviting, which may detract from the experience.
emotionalJobs.desiredOutcomes: A visually appealing and user-friendly website that makes me feel valued as a member.
emotionalJobs.successCriteria: I feel motivated to explore more events and engage with the community because the website feels inviting.

socialJobs.jobStatement: When I participate in events, I want to be seen as an engaged and active member of the community, so I can build relationships and connections.
socialJobs.currentSolution: Attending events and engaging in committees.
socialJobs.painPoints: Difficulty in finding relevant events can hinder participation, affecting how others perceive my involvement.
socialJobs.desiredOutcomes: I want to be perceived as a committed member who actively participates in community activities.
socialJobs.successCriteria: I regularly attend events and am recognized by others as a proactive member of the newcomers community.

supportingJobs.jobStatement: When I need to connect with other committee members, I want to easily find contact information, so I can collaborate effectively.
supportingJobs.currentSolution: The directory on the newcomers website.
supportingJobs.painPoints: Finding contact information can be cumbersome and not easily remembered.
supportingJobs.desiredOutcomes: A straightforward and accessible directory that allows me to find contact details quickly.
supportingJobs.successCriteria: I can locate and contact committee members without frustration or delays.
